title: The Burning of Myrtle Snow (American Horror Story: Coven)
author: Vincent Charlebois
comment:
"I'd rather burn than boil."


Fiona throws cigarette at her...damn disrespect
Myrtle was the real star of this season. Idc idc idc
I'm rewatching Coven right now and I'm sorry to say that Myrtle Snow steals every scene she's in!! She cracks me up every time she appears!! Frances Conroy's best role in AHS!
For me, insane scenes like this one is what makes Coven the best of the series so far.
description: The burning of Myrtle Snow (Frances Conroy) to the song "Right Place, Wrong Time" by Dr. John. In my opinion the best moment of the 3rd season yet, and one of the best moment on the show, all seasons included.
